content.rendered:
Premium Lace-Neck Sublimated Ice Hockey Jersey

Experience the pinnacle of performance and style with our Lace-Neck Sublimated Ice Hockey Jerseys, meticulously crafted for professional and amateur teams alike. Made from 100% polyester, these jerseys provide the ideal blend of durability and comfort, ensuring that players can focus on their game without distraction.

Unmatched Durability and Comfort

Our jerseys feature moisture-wicking technology that keeps players dry and comfortable throughout the game. The lace-neck design not only adds a classic touch but also enhances the fit and feel. Designed for rigorous use, these jerseys maintain their quality and performance even after multiple washes, making them a reliable choice for any team.

State-of-the-Art Sublimation Printing

Utilizing modern dyed HD sublimation, our jerseys boast vibrant and lasting colors. This advanced printing technique allows for full customization, offering an extensive range of design possibilities. Teams can personalize their jerseys with logos, names, and numbers, ensuring a unique and professional look that stands out on the ice.

Customization and Precision

We understand the importance of team identity, which is why we offer comprehensive customization options. From labeling and branding to color choices and sizes ranging from S to 3XL, every detail can be tailored to meet your specific needs. Our jerseys are finished with precision stitching, ensuring a high-quality product that reflects your team’s professionalism.

excerpt.rendered:
Designed for optimal performance and comfort, these jerseys meet the demands of elite players.

  • Material : 100% Polyester
  • Style :Lace-Neck
  • Durability : Moisture-wicking | Player Comfort
  • Embellishment : Modern dyed HD sublimation
  • Print Options : Overall
  • Customization : Labeling & branding on demand
  • Color : Any/On demand
  • Finishing : Precision stitching
  • Sizes : S to 3XL (Available on demand)
  • MOQ : 40
